text: Ra jaba timro palanakartale pharistaharusanga (svargadutaharusanga) bhan'yo ma prthvima khalipha (arko prani) niyukta garnevala chu, ta tiniharule bhane, ke timi yastola'i (manisa) srjana garnechau, jasale prthvima upadrava ra raktapata garnecha? Jabaki hami timro stuti ra pavitrataka gunagana garirakhdachaum. (Allahale) bhan'yoh je ma jandachu, timi jandainau
